level.heading: Short title.
level.text: This chapter may be cited as the "General Cooperative Association Act of 2010".

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Homestead housing preparation program, "condominium or unit owners association" defined, see § 42-2103.
Rental housing conversions and sales, "cooperative" and "Cooperative Act" defined, see § 42-3401.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
